competencies.name: Data Manipulation
competencies.criteria: Can efficiently manipulate large datasets using pandas (groupby, merge, pivot) and other Python data libraries

competencies.name: Object-Oriented & Design Patterns
competencies.criteria: Can design and implement classes in Python using OOP principles and apply common design patterns (Factory, Singleton, etc.)

competencies.name: Asynchronous Programming
competencies.criteria: Can create and manage asynchronous tasks using asyncio and async/await for high-concurrency applications

competencies.name: Functional Programming
competencies.criteria: Can leverage built-in functions (map, filter, reduce) and comprehensions for cleaner, more efficient code

competencies.name: Error Handling & Debugging
competencies.criteria: Can implement robust exception handling and use Python debugging tools (pdb, logging) effectively

competencies.name: Performance Optimization
competencies.criteria: Can profile Python code (using cProfile, line_profiler) and optimize bottlenecks for better performance

competencies.name: Package & Dependency Management
competencies.criteria: Can manage environments and dependencies with pip, conda, or Poetry

competencies.name: Testing
competencies.criteria: Can write unit and integration tests using pytest or unittest, including mocking and coverage

competencies.name: Documentation & Type Hints
competencies.criteria: Can write clear docstrings (Google or NumPy style), generate Sphinx docs, and use type hints for maintainability

competencies.name: Data Manipulation
competencies.criteria: Can use dplyr, tidyr, and other tidyverse tools for efficient data wrangling

competencies.name: Statistical Analysis
competencies.criteria: Can perform descriptive and inferential statistics using base R, stats, and other packages

competencies.name: ggplot2 & Visualization
competencies.criteria: Can create sophisticated plots with ggplot2 using the grammar of graphics

competencies.name: R Markdown & Reporting
competencies.criteria: Can produce reproducible reports, dashboards, and presentations with R Markdown and Shiny

competencies.name: Performance & Parallelization
competencies.criteria: Understands strategies for parallel computing (e.g., parallel, foreach) to speed up R workflows

competencies.name: Core Libraries
competencies.criteria: Understands Java collections, concurrency utilities, and I/O classes for building robust applications

competencies.name: Generics
competencies.criteria: Can design and use generic classes and methods for type-safe reusable components

competencies.name: Concurrency
competencies.criteria: Can write thread-safe code using synchronized blocks, locks, and concurrent data structures

competencies.name: Build & Dependency Management
competencies.criteria: Can manage project builds and dependencies with Maven or Gradle

competencies.name: Unit Testing
competencies.criteria: Writes comprehensive tests using JUnit or TestNG, including parameterized tests and coverage analysis

competencies.name: Spring Framework
competencies.criteria: Understands Spring Boot for building RESTful services and dependency injection mechanisms

competencies.name: DOM Manipulation
competencies.criteria: Can efficiently select and manipulate DOM elements using vanilla JavaScript or frameworks

competencies.name: ES6+ Features
competencies.criteria: Understands modern JavaScript syntax (arrow functions, destructuring, modules) and applies best practices

competencies.name: Asynchronous Patterns
competencies.criteria: Uses callbacks, Promises, and async/await for non-blocking operations

competencies.name: Node.js
competencies.criteria: Builds server-side applications, handles routing, and manages packages via npm or Yarn

competencies.name: Layout
competencies.criteria: Arranges charts, legends, and text for optimal information hierarchy

competencies.name: Accessibility
competencies.criteria: Ensures colorblind-friendly palettes and adequate text readability

competencies.name: Distributions
competencies.criteria: Can identify, visualize, and apply appropriate probability distributions

competencies.name: Bayesian Analysis
competencies.criteria: Understands Bayesian inference, prior/posterior distributions, and can perform Bayesian updating

competencies.name: Monte Carlo Simulation
competencies.criteria: Implements random sampling to simulate complex systems and estimate probabilities

competencies.name: Parametric Tests
competencies.criteria: Performs t-tests, ANOVA, and regression-based hypothesis tests

competencies.name: Non-parametric Tests
competencies.criteria: Applies rank-based and other non-parametric methods when assumptions are violated

competencies.name: Multiple Testing
competencies.criteria: Adjusts for multiple comparisons (Bonferroni, FDR) in large-scale experiments

competencies.name: A/B Testing
competencies.criteria: Designs experiments with control/treatment groups and adequate power analysis

competencies.name: Factorial Design
competencies.criteria: Plans factorial or fractional factorial experiments to assess interactions

competencies.name: Linear Regression
competencies.criteria: Builds and interprets linear models, checking assumptions and diagnostic plots

competencies.name: Logistic Regression
competencies.criteria: Models binary outcomes and interprets odds ratios and classification metrics

competencies.name: Mixed Models
competencies.criteria: Handles hierarchical data with random effects to account for nested structures

competencies.name: ARIMA Models
competencies.criteria: Can identify ARIMA orders, fit models, and evaluate forecast accuracy

competencies.name: Seasonality
competencies.criteria: Detects and models seasonal patterns with appropriate decomposition methods

competencies.name: Stationarity
competencies.criteria: Tests for stationarity (ADF/KPSS) and applies transformations (differencing) if needed

competencies.name: Classification
competencies.criteria: Implements and evaluates classifiers (Logistic Regression, Decision Trees, SVM, etc.)

competencies.name: Regression
competencies.criteria: Builds and tunes regression models (Linear, Ridge, Lasso, etc.)

competencies.name: Feature Engineering & Selection
competencies.criteria: Creates domain-relevant features and applies selection or dimensionality reduction

competencies.name: Cross Validation
competencies.criteria: Uses k-fold, stratified, or nested CV to optimize and compare models

competencies.name: Ensemble Methods
competencies.criteria: Implements random forests, gradient boosting, or stacking for improved accuracy

competencies.name: Clustering
competencies.criteria: Applies K-means, Hierarchical, DBSCAN, or similar methods to discover patterns

competencies.name: Dimensionality Reduction
competencies.criteria: Uses PCA, t-SNE, or UMAP to visualize or reduce high-dimensional data

competencies.name: Anomaly Detection
competencies.criteria: Detects outliers using isolation forests, local outlier factor, or robust statistics

competencies.name: Metrics
competencies.criteria: Selects and interprets metrics (precision, recall, RMSE, MAE, AUC, etc.)

competencies.name: Validation Strategy
competencies.criteria: Chooses appropriate train/test splits, time-based splits, or nested CV for robust evaluation

competencies.name: Error Analysis
competencies.criteria: Investigates misclassifications or residuals to refine data features or modeling approach

competencies.name: Model Deployment
competencies.criteria: Packages and serves models via REST APIs, containers, or serverless functions

competencies.name: Monitoring & Maintenance
competencies.criteria: Implements model drift detection, data quality checks, and automated retraining

competencies.name: Version Control
competencies.criteria: Maintains code, data, and model versioning (Git, DVC, MLflow) for reproducibility

competencies.name: Architecture
competencies.criteria: Designs feed-forward networks, autoencoders, or specialized architectures

competencies.name: Convolutional Neural Networks
competencies.criteria: Builds CNNs for image recognition, segmentation, or object detection

competencies.name: Recurrent Neural Networks
competencies.criteria: Implements RNNs, LSTM, or GRU for sequence data

competencies.name: Transformers
competencies.criteria: Works with attention mechanisms for NLP or vision tasks (BERT, GPT, Vision Transformers)

competencies.name: PyTorch
competencies.criteria: Writes custom training loops or uses high-level APIs for building and tuning models

competencies.name: TensorFlow
competencies.criteria: Builds computation graphs or uses Keras to prototype and deploy deep learning models

competencies.name: GPU Training
competencies.criteria: Utilizes GPU acceleration and memory optimization for large-scale training

competencies.name: Hyperparameter Tuning
competencies.criteria: Leverages grid/random search or Bayesian optimization for model improvement

competencies.name: Transfer Learning
competencies.criteria: Adapts pre-trained models to new tasks for faster convergence and reduced data needs

competencies.name: SELECT Queries
competencies.criteria: Writes SELECT statements with proper aliases, filtering (WHERE), and ordering (ORDER BY)

competencies.name: CASE/IF
competencies.criteria: Incorporates conditional logic in queries to handle complex data transformations

competencies.name: GROUP BY & HAVING
competencies.criteria: Aggregates data with GROUP BY and filters groups using HAVING clauses

competencies.name: JOINs
competencies.criteria: Performs INNER, LEFT, RIGHT, FULL joins to combine tables accurately

competencies.name: Window Functions
competencies.criteria: Utilizes functions like RANK(), ROW_NUMBER(), LAG/LEAD for advanced analytical queries

competencies.name: Indexes & Optimization
competencies.criteria: Creates and manages indexes to improve query performance; understands query plans

competencies.name: Normalization
competencies.criteria: Can design normalized schemas (1NF, 2NF, 3NF) to avoid data anomalies and redundancies

competencies.name: Transaction Management
competencies.criteria: Understands ACID properties, locking mechanisms, and isolation levels

competencies.name: MongoDB
competencies.criteria: Works with document-based data, designs schemas, and uses aggregation pipelines

competencies.name: Cassandra
competencies.criteria: Understands wide-column storage, partition keys, and efficient data modeling

competencies.name: Snowflake
competencies.criteria: Can load, transform, and query massive datasets efficiently in Snowflake

competencies.name: BigQuery
competencies.criteria: Builds scalable analytics queries in GCP's serverless data warehouse

competencies.name: Spark
competencies.criteria: Writes PySpark or Scala code to process large datasets in a distributed manner

competencies.name: Hadoop
competencies.criteria: Understands HDFS, MapReduce, and the broader Hadoop ecosystem (Hive, Pig)

competencies.name: Streaming
competencies.criteria: Implements data pipelines with real-time frameworks (Kafka, Flink, Spark Streaming)

competencies.name: AWS Data Tools
competencies.criteria: Uses AWS EMR, Glue, or Kinesis for big data and analytics workflows

competencies.name: GCP Data Tools
competencies.criteria: Leverages Dataflow, Pub/Sub, or Dataproc for scalable data processing

competencies.name: Azure Data Tools
competencies.criteria: Implements big data solutions with Azure HDInsight, Data Factory, or Synapse

competencies.name: Microservices & Monoliths
competencies.criteria: Understands trade-offs between service decomposition and monolithic architectures

competencies.name: Event-Driven
competencies.criteria: Designs decoupled systems with queues, pub/sub mechanisms, and asynchronous flows

competencies.name: RESTful & GraphQL
competencies.criteria: Creates well-versioned, documented APIs with clean resource structures

competencies.name: Load Handling
competencies.criteria: Identifies potential bottlenecks and applies horizontal/vertical scaling strategies

competencies.name: Fault Tolerance
competencies.criteria: Implements replication, failover, and redundancy to ensure minimal downtime

competencies.name: Automation Pipelines
competencies.criteria: Sets up automated builds, tests, and deployments using Jenkins, GitHub Actions, or GitLab CI

competencies.name: Docker
competencies.criteria: Builds and manages Docker images, understands multi-stage builds, and container security

competencies.name: Kubernetes
competencies.criteria: Deploys and scales microservices on Kubernetes, configures pods, services, and ingresses

competencies.name: Terraform
competencies.criteria: Defines and provisions infrastructure across cloud providers with Terraform modules

competencies.name: Metrics & Logging
competencies.criteria: Uses Prometheus, Grafana, or ELK stack to track performance and troubleshoot issues

competencies.name: Unit Testing
competencies.criteria: Verifies individual components or functions in isolation

competencies.name: Integration Testing
competencies.criteria: Ensures multiple components interact correctly in a cohesive system

competencies.name: End-to-End Testing
competencies.criteria: Simulates user workflows to validate the entire product flow

competencies.name: Load & Stress
competencies.criteria: Measures application throughput and behavior under high concurrency

competencies.name: Test-Driven Development
competencies.criteria: Writes tests before code (TDD) or uses user stories (BDD) to guide development

competencies.name: Single Responsibility
competencies.criteria: Ensures each module/class has a single, clear purpose

competencies.name: Open/Closed & Liskov
competencies.criteria: Understands extension without modification and proper subclassing behavior

competencies.name: Creational & Structural
competencies.criteria: Knows patterns like Factory, Builder, Adapter, and Proxy for reuse and flexibility

competencies.name: Legacy Code
competencies.criteria: Can clean up and restructure outdated codebases for better maintainability

competencies.name: AWS
competencies.criteria: Understands core AWS offerings (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda) and security best practices

competencies.name: Azure
competencies.criteria: Familiar with Azure VMs, App Services, Azure DevOps, and monitoring tools

competencies.name: GCP
competencies.criteria: Uses Google Compute Engine, Cloud Run, Cloud Storage, and IAM for secure deployments

competencies.name: Function Orchestration
competencies.criteria: Builds event-driven ML or data pipelines using AWS Lambda, Google Cloud Functions, or Azure Functions

competencies.name: OWASP Top 10
competencies.criteria: Knows common web vulnerabilities and how to mitigate them (SQL Injection, XSS, CSRF)

competencies.name: OAuth/JWT
competencies.criteria: Implements secure token-based authentication and role-based access control

competencies.name: Data in Transit & At Rest
competencies.criteria: Applies SSL/TLS for network security and uses encryption libraries or services for stored data

competencies.name: Technical Writing
competencies.criteria: Produces clear documentation, specs, and knowledge base articles

competencies.name: Reports
competencies.criteria: Summarizes findings or project updates in concise, data-driven reports

competencies.name: Presentations
competencies.criteria: Delivers engaging presentations with clear objectives and audience focus

competencies.name: Stakeholder Management
competencies.criteria: Communicates timelines, risks, and resource needs with business or client stakeholders

competencies.name: Code Reviews
competencies.criteria: Provides constructive feedback, adheres to coding standards, and fosters collective ownership

competencies.name: Pair Programming
competencies.criteria: Collaborates in real-time to share expertise and maintain code quality

competencies.name: Agile/Scrum
competencies.criteria: Understands sprint planning, daily stand-ups, backlog grooming, and retrospectives

competencies.name: Blameless Postmortems
competencies.criteria: Facilitates post-incident reviews focusing on systemic improvements rather than individual blame

competencies.name: LLM Pair Programming
competencies.criteria: Effectively uses GitHub Copilot or CodeWhisperer while verifying AI-suggested code for correctness

competencies.name: Application Profiling
competencies.criteria: Uses tools (e.g., JMeter, cProfile, New Relic) to identify performance bottlenecks

competencies.name: Server/Client Caching
competencies.criteria: Implements in-memory caches (Redis) or edge caching (Cloudflare) to reduce latency

competencies.name: Scalability Check
competencies.criteria: Conducts load/stress tests to ensure the system meets performance SLAs

competencies.name: Distributed Tracing
competencies.criteria: Uses Jaeger or OpenTelemetry to trace requests across microservices for root cause analysis

competencies.name: Chaos Engineering
competencies.criteria: Uses tools like Gremlin or Chaos Monkey to inject failures and improve system robustness

competencies.name: Strategic Alignment
competencies.criteria: Defines a clear product vision aligned with business objectives and user needs

competencies.name: Opportunity Analysis
competencies.criteria: Evaluates market trends, competitor offerings, and potential gaps for product growth

competencies.name: Revenue Models
competencies.criteria: Investigates pricing strategies (subscription, freemium) and tests monetization hypotheses

competencies.name: API Contract Comprehension
competencies.criteria: Understands OpenAPI/Swagger specs and collaborates on clear, stable API contracts

competencies.name: Architecture Decision Records
competencies.criteria: Authors ADRs to capture context and trade-offs behind significant technical decisions

competencies.name: OKR/KPI Tree Development
competencies.criteria: Aligns product initiatives with overarching objectives and key results

competencies.name: Usage-Based Pricing
competencies.criteria: Analyzes usage patterns to design scalable pay-as-you-go or consumption-based models

competencies.name: GDPR/CCPA
competencies.criteria: Ensures data handling, consent, and privacy features align with global regulations

competencies.name: User Insights
competencies.criteria: Designs unbiased surveys and conducts interviews to gather user pain points and desires

competencies.name: Prototype Validation
competencies.criteria: Sets up user testing sessions and iterates designs based on feedback

competencies.name: Target Audience
competencies.criteria: Creates detailed personas to guide feature prioritization and communication

competencies.name: Jobs-to-be-Done (JTBD)
competencies.criteria: Conducts JTBD interviews to pinpoint core user needs and motivations

competencies.name: Conjoint Analysis
competencies.criteria: Designs conjoint studies to measure feature trade-offs and pricing sensitivity

competencies.name: Goal Setting
competencies.criteria: Defines KPIs (e.g., MAU, churn, LTV) and monitors them for continuous product improvement

competencies.name: A/B Testing
competencies.criteria: Formulates hypotheses, sets up experiments, and interprets statistical significance

competencies.name: Behavioral Patterns
competencies.criteria: Segments users by cohort to uncover usage patterns and product adoption trends

competencies.name: A/B Testing Platforms
competencies.criteria: Configures and manages Optimizely, LaunchDarkly, or Statsig for controlled experiments

competencies.name: Culture & Morale
competencies.criteria: Inspires teams, fosters psychological safety, and drives engagement

competencies.name: Mediation
competencies.criteria: Navigates disagreements and finds common ground to keep teams productive

competencies.name: Data-Informed
competencies.criteria: Balances data, intuition, and stakeholder input to make timely, effective decisions

competencies.name: TAM/SAM/SOM
competencies.criteria: Estimates market size and identifies viable segments for product expansion

competencies.name: Value-Based Pricing
competencies.criteria: Researches willingness-to-pay and competitive pricing to optimize revenue

competencies.name: Launch Planning
competencies.criteria: Coordinates cross-functional launch activities, ensuring product readiness and marketing alignment

competencies.name: Requirement Prioritization
competencies.criteria: Maintains a backlog reflecting business impact, user value, and technical feasibility

competencies.name: Acceptance Criteria
competencies.criteria: Documents user stories with clear, testable acceptance criteria

competencies.name: Versioning & Rollouts
competencies.criteria: Schedules releases with clear scope, dependencies, and communication plans

competencies.name: Low/High Fidelity
competencies.criteria: Uses tools (Figma, Sketch) to create and iterate on interface concepts

competencies.name: WCAG Standards
competencies.criteria: Ensures compliance with accessibility guidelines for all users

competencies.name: WCAG 2.2
competencies.criteria: Adheres to latest accessibility guidelines, ensuring inclusive design for diverse user needs

competencies.name: Site/App Structure
competencies.criteria: Organizes content and navigation flows for intuitive user experiences

competencies.name: Translating Business to Data
competencies.criteria: Identifies core business challenges and reframes them into clear technical or data questions

competencies.name: Competitive Landscape
competencies.criteria: Keeps updated on industry trends, emerging technologies, and competitor offerings

competencies.name: ROI & Impact
competencies.criteria: Defines success criteria, tracks ROI, and correlates product outcomes to business goals

competencies.name: Reporting & Alignment
competencies.criteria: Facilitates regular updates to executive teams, ensuring transparency and alignment

competencies.name: Experiment Tracking
competencies.criteria: Uses MLflow or Weights & Biases to log parameters, metrics, and artifacts for reproducible experiments

competencies.name: Model Quantization
competencies.criteria: Optimizes neural networks for edge or low-resource environments through quantization and pruning

competencies.name: Delta Lake
competencies.criteria: Implements ACID transactions on data lakes, enabling reliable data pipelines at scale

competencies.name: Feature Store Management
competencies.criteria: Maintains consistent training/serving features with tools like Feast or Tecton

competencies.criteria: Uses dbt for modular SQL transformations, version control, and testing within analytics workflows

competencies.name: Collaborative Modeling
competencies.criteria: Uses Neptune.ai or Comet.ml for shared experiment dashboards and artifact versioning

competencies.name: Model Cards
competencies.criteria: Creates standardized model documentation outlining performance, limitations, and ethical considerations

competencies.criteria: Implements micro-frontend architectures using Module Federation or single-spa for large-scale web apps

competencies.name: WebAssembly Integration
competencies.criteria: Leverages WebAssembly for performance-critical modules within browser environments
